comments.body: The method name `FilterEmptyPredicateTest` is misleading. The test is actually checking a predicate that matches no elements. Consider renaming it to something like `FilterNoMatchingElementsTest`.
The method `Fold` throws an `EmptyCollectionFoldException` when the source is empty. Consider providing an overload that accepts an initial seed value to handle empty collections gracefully.

The `Map` method could be more flexible by allowing the function to change the type of the elements. Consider changing the signature to `public static IEnumerable<TResult> Map<TSource, TResult>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, TResult> func)`.
